The Biden Administration's disturbing decision to halt new oil and gas drilling permits amid $4 gas prices and escalating conflict with Russia could not have come at a worse time. I am baffled by this move against American citizens and the economy. #utpol

We must continue working with our allies to permanently terminate the Nord Stream 2 pipeline. The United States, NATO, and friends of democracy across the world must come together to stand with Ukraine and deter further Russian aggression. #utpol (4/4)

Now is the time for strength and leadership from the White House. I strongly urge the passage of the Never Yielding Europe‚Äôs Territory Act, legislation I cosponsored that would bolster Ukraine‚Äôs capabilities, impose crippling sanctions, and hold Russia accountable. #utpol (3/4)

Yesterday‚Äôs additional sanctions on financial institutions and oligarchs are appreciated but continue to fall short. I hope to see further measures that fulfill President Biden's commitment to a swift and severe response to the violation of Ukraine‚Äôs sovereignty. #utpol (2/4)

Russia‚Äôs wanton onslaught against Ukraine‚Äôs sovereignty undermines decades of the U.S.-led world order. The sanctions announced this week by the Biden Administration targeting solely the separatist movements in Eastern Ukraine did not go far enough. #utpol (1/4)

3) Congress must clarify our constitutional role with respect to counting electoral votes. Election authority must remain at the local level, and Congress must abide by that principle to ensure election integrity is never leveraged by political gain. #utpol
2) Political violence of any kind is 100% unacceptable, and we need to drastically tone down rhetoric that harms our relationships and communities. #utpol

In addition to what I have previously communicated to press regarding January 6, 2021, I have three final thoughts as we move forward: 

1) Our law enforcement and first responders continue to deserve our utmost respect; the @CapitolPolice were heroes that day. #utpol

3) Congress must clarify our constitutional role with respect to counting electoral votes. Election authority must remain at the local level, and Congress must abide by that principle to ensure election integrity is never leveraged by political gain. #utpol
2) Political violence of any kind is 100% unacceptable, and we need to drastically tone down rhetoric that harms our relationships and communities. #utpol
